Posts.Content: May 16, 2012 07:52AM Nervous_Nelly wrote: Hi Nancy... No they did not give me any info as of yet...And No I have not seen any report! It seems I am in the dark... I believe it will first be a needle Biopsy..However they scheduled me an appt. with a doctor to do the biopsy, and when I called to confirm my appt the receptionist informed me that in fact the biopsy would not be done that day, so I am thinking maybe he would just like to go over the report with me first.. I really do not know how all this is supposed to work, I am so confused... Either way I think I will request if I can, that whatever this lump may be they go ahead and take it out... I am in no way trying to tell a doctor how to practice medicine, but whatever this is does not belong in me and I want nothing more than to have it gone, even if it is not cancer kwim? It is causing me alot of stress and worry, and even though I know I should not worry until I have some kind of diagnoses, but that is just me a worrier...And my poor family has to deal with me being on edge all the time...

Posts.Content: May 16, 2012 08:32AM Nervous_Nelly wrote: Thank you all... The lump is palpable, I found it myself...I was having burning sensations in my breast,months and months ago and thought nothing of it because "cancer does not hurt" I found the lump about 3 mos ago but thought nothing of it because of my age which is 37..I have been told "most people do not develop BC until well into their 40's" and I was in my cycle.. But I felt it again in the shower so decided to have it checked, and here I am... A nervous nelly lol... I know the chances are in my favor of it not being a form of BC but I am a pessimist by nature...I try not to be but it is a hard habit to break..
